task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo gráfico probabilístico de varias etapas para pronosticar la probabilidad de insuficiencia renal en pacientes críticos que se presentan con infección del torrente sanguíneo dentro de los dos días posteriores al ingreso en la UCI.  El modelo debe: 1) integrar las dependencias temporales entre las variables, 2) considerar el riesgo competidor de mortalidad, 3) tener en cuenta los factores de confusión variables en el tiempo, 4) aprovechar los datos de EHR estructurados y los datos clínicos no estructurados a través de la extracción de PVN, 5) mide la incertidumbre en las predicciones y 6) ofrecen proyecciones de riesgo individualizadas con triunfos de decisión por intervención temporal.

physician_notes: Text entries containing subjective assessments, physical exam findings, and clinical impressions
nursing_notes: Text entries containing fluid balance, medication timing, and patient response information
radiology_reports: Text entries describing imaging findings relevant to sepsis and fluid status

task_details.mathematical_formulation:
Bayesian Network Model for Renal Failure Prediction in Bloodstream Infection:

Let G = (V, E) be a directed acyclic graph representing our Bayesian network where:
- V = {X₁, X₂, ..., Xₙ} represents the set of random variables (clinical parameters)
- E represents the set of edges encoding conditional dependencies

The joint probability distribution factorizes as:
P(X₁, X₂, ..., Xₙ) = ∏ᵢ P(Xᵢ | Pa(Xᵢ))
where Pa(Xᵢ) denotes the parents of Xᵢ in G

For temporal modeling, let Xᵢᵗ denote variable Xᵢ at time t. The dynamic Bayesian network includes both:
- Intra-slice dependencies: P(Xᵢᵗ | Xⱼᵗ) for t fixed
- Inter-slice dependencies: P(Xᵢᵗ | Xⱼᵗ⁻¹)

Competing risk formulation:
Let T_RF be the time to renal failure and T_death be the time to death
The cause-specific hazard for renal failure at time t is:
λ_RF(t|X) = lim_{Δt→0} P(t ≤ T_RF < t+Δt, T_RF < T_death | T_RF ≥ t, T_death ≥ t, X) / Δt

The subdistribution hazard for renal failure accounting for the competing risk of death:
h_RF(t|X) = lim_{Δt→0} P(t ≤ T_RF < t+Δt, T_RF < T_death | (T_RF ≥ t) ∪ (T_death < t ∩ T_RF > T_death), X) / Δt

For personalized prediction at time τ given history Hτ:
P(Renal Failure in [τ, τ+48h] | Hτ) = 1 - exp(-∫ₜ∈[τ,τ+48] λ_RF(t|Hτ) dt)

Causal effect of intervention I:
P(Renal Failure | do(I=i)) = ∑ₓ P(Renal Failure | I=i, X=x)P(X=x)
where do(I=i) represents setting intervention I to value i

Uncertainty quantification:
Credible interval for Renal Failure prediction: [q₀.₀₂₅, q₀.₉₇₅] where qₐ is the a-quantile of the posterior distribution

NLP-derived features:
For unstructured text T, clinical concept C extracted via NLP:
P(C present | T) via contextual embedding model

Variable importance measure:
Shapley value for feature Xᵢ: φᵢ = ∑_{S⊆N\{i}} (|S|!(|N|-|S|-1)!)/(|N|!) [v(S∪{i}) - v(S)]
where v(S) is the prediction performance using only features in subset S

task_details.task_instructions: Konstruieren Sie ein multi-stufiges probabilistisches grafisches Modell, um die Wahrscheinlichkeit eines Nierenversagens (RF) bei kritisch kranken Patienten mit systemischer Infektion (SI) innerhalb von 48 Stunden nach der Aufnahme in der Intensivstation in der Intensivstation vorherzusagen.  Das Modell sollte: 1) zeitliche Assoziationen zwischen Faktoren integrieren, 2) das konkurrierende Mortalitätsrisiko berücksichtigen, 3) zeitabhängige verwirrende Variablen ausmachen, 4) sowohl strukturierte EHR-Daten als auch unstrukturierte klinische Erzählungen verwenden, indem NLP-Merkmalextraktion gemessen wird.

task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo gráfico probabilístico de varias etapas para pronosticar la probabilidad de insuficiencia renal dentro de las 48 horas posteriores a la admisión a la UCI en pacientes críticos diagnosticados con sepsis. Este modelo debe: 1) tener en cuenta la secuencia cronológica de variables, 2) considerar el riesgo competidor de mortalidad, 3) Correcto para las variables de confusión dependientes del tiempo, 4) Integre los datos de EHR estructurados y las notas clínicas no estructuradas, utilizando la PNL para extraer información, 5) Proporcionar una medida de incertidumbre asociada con las predicciones y 6) generar las proyecciones de riesgo individualizadas, incluidas las tres compuestas de los tres, incluidas las interventiones tempranas.

task_details.task_instructions: Construisez un modèle complet de prédiction du risque multimodal pour la réhospitalisation de 30 jours chez les patients diagnostiqués avec une insuffisance cardiaque systolique (SHF) après la sortie.  Le modèle doit intégrer des facteurs cliniques, en laboratoire, radiologiques et génomiques, en considérant les facteurs socioéconomiques et les marqueurs spécifiques des maladies.  Fournir une analyse approfondie de la contribution de chaque facteur, calculer les mesures de performance à travers divers sous-groupes de patients et évaluer la cohérence du modèle au fil du temps à l'aide des courbes AUC dépendantes du temps.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
For the multi-modal risk prediction model:

1. Logistic Regression Component:
   P(rehospitalization) = 1 / (1 + e^(-z))
   where z = β₀ + β₁x₁ + β₂x₂ + ... + βₙxₙ
   
2. Cox Proportional Hazards Component:
   h(t) = h₀(t) × exp(β₁x₁ + β₂x₂ + ... + βₙxₙ)
   where h(t) is the hazard function and h₀(t) is the baseline hazard
   
3. Random Forest Component:
   For each tree (t = 1 to T), classify patient into rehospitalization risk category
   Final prediction = majority vote across all trees
   
4. Model Performance Metrics:
   Sensitivity = TP / (TP + FN)
   Specificity = TN / (TN + FP)
   PPV = TP / (TP + FP)
   NPV = TN / (TN + FN)
   AUC-ROC = ∫ TPR d(FPR)
   
5. Time-Dependent ROC Analysis:
   AUC(t) = P(M_i > M_j | D_i(t) = 1, D_j(t) = 0)
   where M is the risk score and D(t) is the event status at time t
   
6. Net Reclassification Improvement:
   NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]
   
7. Integrated Discrimination Improvement:
   IDI = (μ̂new,events - μ̂new,non-events) - (μ̂old,events - μ̂old,non-events)
   
8. Calibration Assessment:
   Hosmer-Lemeshow χ² = Σ [(O_g - E_g)² / (E_g × (1 - E_g/n_g))]
   where O_g is observed events and E_g is expected events in group g

task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo de predicción multimodal integral para la rehospitalización de 30 días en pacientes diagnosticados con insuficiencia cardíaca sistólica (SHF) después del alta.  El modelo integrará factores clínicos, de laboratorio, radiológicos y genómicos, considerando factores socioeconómicos e indicadores específicos de la enfermedad.  Cuantifique la importancia relativa de cada factor, determine el rendimiento del modelo en diversos grupos de pacientes y evalúe su consistencia temporal utilizando curvas de operación del receptor dependiente del tiempo (ROC).

task_details.task_instructions: Cree un modelo de predicción multivariante exhaustivo para estimar la probabilidad de supervivencia a 5 años en individuos diagnosticados con carcinoma broncogénico de etapa avanzada (III-IV).  El modelo integrará marcadores genómicos, características clínicas, estrategias de tratamiento y medidas de comorbilidad. El modelo debe considerar los cambios de respuesta al tratamiento con el tiempo, incorporar factores que varían en el tiempo, abordar los datos faltantes utilizando múltiples métodos de imputación y producir tanto predicciones generales de población como evaluaciones de riesgos personalizadas con intervalos de confianza confiables.  Además, el análisis debería explorar posibles interacciones gen-ambientales, perfiles moleculares específicos del tratamiento y descubrir nuevos marcadores pronósticos mediante la utilización de técnicas de selección variable penalizadas.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
Construct a Cox proportional hazards model with time-dependent variables for overall survival (OS):

h(t|X) = h₀(t) × exp(β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₚXₚ + γ₁Z₁(t) + γ₂Z₂(t) + ... + γₘZₘ(t))

where h₀(t) represents the baseline hazard rate, X₁ to Xₚ are baseline covariates, Z₁(t) to Zₘ(t) denote time-dependent covariates, and β₁ to βₚ and γ₁ to γₘ are their corresponding regression coefficients.

Employ a shared frailty model to account for correlations in survival times within patients:

h₁ᵢⱼ(t) = h₀₁(t) × exp(β₁'X₁ᵢⱼ + ω₁ᵢ)
h₂ᵢⱼ(t) = h₀₂(t) × exp(β₂'X₂ᵢⱼ + ω₂ᵢ)

where ω₁ᵢ and ω₂ᵢ are correlated frailty terms represented by a bivariate distribution.

For genomic data integration, use an elastic net penalty:

min(β) { ||y - Xβ||² + λ[(1-α)||β||² + α||β||₁] }

where λ is the regularization parameter and α controls the balance between ridge (α=0) and lasso (α=1) penalties.

For competing risks, compute the cumulative incidence function (CIF):

CIF₁(t) = ∫₀ᵗ S(u-) × h₁(u) du

where S(u-) is the overall survival function immediately prior to time u, and h₁(u) represents the cause-specific hazard for event type 1.

Handle missing data using multiple imputation by chained equations (MICE):

P(X_miss | X_obs, θ) where θ ~ P(θ | X_obs)

Assess model uncertainty and calibration with bootstrapped 95% confidence intervals and the integrated Brier score (IBS):

IBS = (1/n) Σᵢ₌₁ⁿ ∫₀ᵀ [I(Tᵢ > t) - S(t|Xᵢ)]² dw(t)

where I(Tᵢ > t) denotes the event indicator, S(t|Xᵢ) is the predicted survival probability, and w(t) represents a weight function.

task_details.task_instructions: Créez un modèle de prédiction multivarié complet pour estimer la probabilité de survie à 5 ans chez les individus diagnostiqués avec un carcinome bronchogène de stade avancé (III-IV).  Le modèle doit intégrer des marqueurs génomiques, des caractéristiques cliniques, des approches thérapeutiques et des scores de comorbidité.  Il doit tenir compte des modèles de réponse au traitement au fil du temps, intégrer des facteurs variant dans le temps, gérer les données manquantes en utilisant une imputation multiple et produire à la fois des prévisions à l'échelle de la population et des évaluations des risques individualisées avec des intervalles de confiance calibrés.  En outre, il devrait étudier les interactions génières-environnement potentielles, les profils moléculaires spécifiques au traitement et découvrir de nouveaux marqueurs pronostiques via des techniques de sélection variable régularisées.

task_details.task_instructions: Erstellen Sie ein umfassendes multivariates Vorhersagemodell, um die 5-Jahres-Lebensdauer-Wahrscheinlichkeit bei Personen abzuschätzen, bei denen das Karzinom der Lunge (pulmonale Malignität) mit einer ausgefeilten Integration genomischer Marker, klinischer Eigenschaften, therapeutischen Ansätze und Komorbiditätsmessungen diagnostiziert wurde. Das Modell muss im Laufe der Zeit die Kinetik der Behandlungsreaktion berücksichtigen, zeitlich variierende Kovariaten einbeziehen, fehlende Daten unter Verwendung mehrerer Imputationsmethoden ansprechen und sowohl Vorhersagen auf Populationsebene als auch individualisierte Risikostratifizierung mit gut kalibrierten Konfidenzintervallen generieren.  Darüber hinaus analysieren Sie potenzielle Gen-Umwelt-Wechselwirkungen, behandlungsspezifische molekulare Signaturen und neue prognostische Indikatoren unter Verwendung regulierter Merkmalsauswahltechniken.

task_details.task_instructions: Analysieren Sie die gegebene Patientenkohorte, bei der Plasmazelldyscrasie diagnostiziert wurde, um ein umfassendes Cox -Proportional -Gefahrenmodell zur Vorhersage des Gesamtüberlebens zu entwickeln.  Das Modell sollte genomische, klinische, Labor- und Behandlungsmerkmale einbeziehen. Erstellen Sie anschließend ein Risikostratifizierungsschema, um Patienten in Risikogruppen zu kategorisieren, die auf den Vorhersagen des Modells basieren. Validieren Sie die prädiktive Leistung des Modells mithilfe von Harrells Konkordanzindex- und Kalibrierungsdiagrammen. Geben Sie schließlich individuelle Vorhersagen für die Überlebenswahrscheinlichkeit für drei neue Patienten vor, darunter ihre 1-Jahres-, 3-Jahres- und 5-Jahres-Überlebenswahrscheinlichkeiten mit damit verbundenen Konfidenzintervallen.

data_dictionary.ECOG: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status (0-4)

task_details.mathematical_formulation:
Cox Proportional Hazards Model: h(t|X) = h₀(t)exp(β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₚXₚ)
where h(t|X) is the hazard at time t with covariates X, h₀(t) is the baseline hazard, and β represents the coefficients.

Harrell's C-statistic = P(T̂ᵢ > T̂ⱼ | Tᵢ > Tⱼ), where T̂ represents predicted survival time and T represents actual survival time.

Risk Score Calculation: RS = ∑βᵢXᵢ

Risk Category Assignment:
Low Risk: RS < Q₁
Intermediate Risk: Q₁ ≤ RS ≤ Q₃
High Risk: RS > Q₃
where Q₁ and Q₃ are the first and third quartiles of risk scores.

Survival Probability Calculation: S(t) = S₀(t)^exp(RS)
where S₀(t) is the baseline survival function.

95% Confidence Interval for Survival Probability: S(t)^exp(RS) × exp(±1.96×SE)
where SE is the standard error of the risk score.

task_details.task_instructions: Examine el grupo de pacientes amueblado diagnosticado con mieloma de células plasmáticas para crear un modelo integral de riesgos proporcionales de Cox para predecir la vida útil, la integración de las características genómicas, clínicas, de laboratorio y de tratamiento.  Posteriormente, genere un esquema de categorización de riesgo que asigna a los pacientes a arriesgar estratos según el modelo.  Valide el rendimiento predictivo del modelo utilizando el índice C de Harrell y las curvas de calibración. Finalmente, produzca proyecciones de probabilidad de vida útil individualizada para tres pacientes nuevos, incluidas sus probabilidades de supervivencia de 1 año, 3 años y 5 años junto con intervalos de confianza asociados.

task_details.task_instructions: Erstellen Sie einen umfassenden diagnostischen Algorithmus und ein probabilistisches klinisches Entscheidungsunterstützungssystem für Patienten mit ungeklärtem Bewusstseinsverlust. Der Algorithmus muss: 1) Patienten in Risikogruppen anhand bestimmter klinischer Faktoren einteilen, 2) eine Rangliste potenzieller Diagnosen mit zugehörigen Wahrscheinlichkeiten erzeugen, basierend auf klinischen Beobachtungen, 3) vorgeschlagene diagnostische Verfahren vorschlagen, einschließlich Vor- und Nach-Test-Wahrscheinlichkeitsberechnungen, 4) Integrieren von Bayesian-Aktualisierungen, um neue Test-Erkenntnisse zu integrieren, und 5) Anbietungsempfehlungen basieren auf den endgültigen Diagnostik-Wahrscheinlichkeiten.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Pretest probability calculation: P(D) = prevalence in demographic group adjusted by risk modifiers
2. Likelihood ratio (LR) for clinical finding: LR+ = sensitivity/(1-specificity); LR- = (1-sensitivity)/specificity
3. Post-test odds = pretest odds × LR; where pretest odds = pretest probability/(1-pretest probability)
4. Post-test probability = post-test odds/(1+post-test odds)
5. Bayesian updating for multiple tests: Final post-test odds = pretest odds × LR1 × LR2 × ... × LRn
6. Diagnostic threshold calculation: Test when |utility(treatment|disease) - utility(no treatment|disease)| × P(disease) > |utility(treatment|no disease) - utility(no treatment|no disease)| × (1-P(disease))
7. Risk score calculation: Σ(βi × xi) where βi = log(odds ratio) for risk factor i, xi = presence (1) or absence (0) of risk factor i
8. Threshold for high risk: calculated score ≥ 3.0
9. Incremental cost-effectiveness ratio: (Cost_A - Cost_B)/(Effectiveness_A - Effectiveness_B)

task_details.task_instructions: Construisez une voie de diagnostic complète pour un patient présentant une pyrexie de source indéterminée (PUS), en utilisant un raisonnement probabiliste bayésien. La voie doit: 1) produire une liste complète des diagnostics potentiels hiérarchisés par vraisemblance, 2) recommander la série optimale d'enquêtes de diagnostic pour maximiser la précision diagnostique tout en minimisant les risques des patients et la consommation de ressources, 3) affiner en continu les probabilités postérieures à mesure que les résultats des tests sont obtenus, 4) Offrent une stratégie de diagnostic finale avec un intervalle de confiance et 5) le cas échéant.

physical_examination.heent: no sinus tenderness, no oral lesions, no lymphadenopathy
physical_examination.cardiovascular: regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
physical_examination.abdominal: mild right upper quadrant tenderness, no hepatosplenomegaly
physical_examination.extremities: no edema, no joint swelling or erythema
physical_examination.neurological: alert and oriented, no focal deficits

initial_imaging.chest_radiograph: no acute cardiopulmonary process, no evidence of infiltrates, effusions, or masses
initial_imaging.abdominal_ultrasound: mild hepatic steatosis, no focal lesions, normal biliary tree, no splenomegaly

task_details.mathematical_formulation: The diagnostic pathway will employ Bayes' theorem to compute posterior probabilities: P(D|S) = [P(S|D) × P(D)] / P(S), where P(D|S) represents the posterior probability of disease D given symptom/test S, P(S|D) denotes the sensitivity of symptom/test S for disease D, P(D) is the prior probability of disease D, and P(S) denotes the probability of symptom/test S within the population. For sequential testing: P(D|S₁∩S₂) = [P(S₂|D) × P(D|S₁)] / P(S₂|S₁), where P(D|S₁∩S₂) represents the posterior probability following both tests, P(S₂|D) is the sensitivity of test S₂, P(D|S₁) is the posterior probability after test S₁, and P(S₂|S₁) is the probability of a positive S₂ result given a positive S₁ result. Test selection will maximize information gain while minimizing cost and risk: Utility(test) = [Information Gain] - [λ₁ × Cost] - [λ₂ × Risk], where Information Gain = H(D) - H(D|test) = -Σᵢ P(dᵢ)log₂P(dᵢ) + Σᵢ P(test)Σⱼ P(dⱼ|test)log₂P(dⱼ|test), λ₁ and λ₂ are weighting parameters for cost and risk significance. Diagnostic confidence will be expressed as confidence intervals: CI = p ± z√[p(1-p)/n], where p represents the probability, z is the z-score for the desired confidence level, and n is the effective sample size.

task_details.task_instructions: Cree un sistema computacional para clasificar las etapas de la esclerosis lateral amiotrófica (ELA) utilizando datos longitudinales de pacientes múltiples múltiples. Esto implica: 1) identificar biomarcadores clave a partir de datos genómicos, transcriptómicos, proteómicos y clínicos; 2) desarrollar un modelo de aprendizaje automático interpretable para predecir la progresión de la enfermedad; 3) construir un modelo de inferencia causal para evaluar los efectos del tratamiento en los grupos de pacientes identificados; y 4) presentar un sistema de estratificación clínicamente aplicable con marcadores pronósticos y recomendaciones de tratamiento a medida.

genomic_data.structural_variants: Copy number variations and structural rearrangements

task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Disease Progression Model: ALSFRS(t) = ALSFRS₀ - β·t + γ·exp(-α·t) + ε, where β represents linear progression rate, γ·exp(-α·t) captures non-linear early decline, and ε is Gaussian noise.
2. Survival Analysis: h(t|X) = h₀(t)·exp(Xβ), where h(t|X) is the hazard function, h₀(t) is the baseline hazard, and X is the feature vector.
3. Multi-omics Integration: Z = f(W₁X₁ + W₂X₂ + ... + WₖXₖ), where Z is the latent representation, Xᵢ are modality-specific features, and Wᵢ are learned weights.
4. Treatment Effect Estimation: τ(x) = E[Y(1) - Y(0)|X=x], where Y(1) and Y(0) are potential outcomes under treatment and control.
5. Causal Mediation: τ = τₘ + τₚ, decomposing treatment effect τ into mediated effect τₘ and direct effect τₚ.
6. Subgroup Identification: G = {g₁,...,gₖ} such that argmin ∑ᵢ∑ⱼ∈ₖ d(xⱼ,μₖ) subject to heterogeneity constraints.

task_details.task_instructions: Cree un modelo de predicción multivariante integral para la deterioro renal de cirugía post-cardíaca, integrando factores de riesgo preoperatorios, parámetros intraoperatorios e indicadores postoperatorios tempranos.  El modelo debe clasificar a los pacientes en grupos de riesgos, ofrecer orientación clínica procesable y validarse utilizando pautas clínicas establecidas (KDIGO, AKIN, Rifle). Analice los patrones temporales de los indicadores de la función renal y su asociación con los índices hemodinámicos para determinar los puntos de intervención óptimos.  Para cada paciente, calcule las probabilidades de desarrollar insuficiencia renal en estadio 1, 2 o 3 dentro de los 7 días posteriores a la cirugía, junto con intervalos de confianza.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Multivariate Logistic Regression Model for renal impairment risk prediction: log(P(Renal Failure)/(1-P(Renal Failure))) = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ where Xₙ represents preoperative risk factors, intraoperative variables, and biomarkers. 

2. Cox Proportional Hazards Model for time-to-renal failure: h(t) = h₀(t)exp(β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ) where h₀(t) is the baseline hazard function. 

3. Random Forest classification algorithm with feature importance metric I(X) = ∑ᵣp(τ)Δi(s,τ) where p(τ) is the proportion of samples reaching node τ and Δi(s,τ) is the impurity decrease. 

4. Temporal biomarker dynamics: dB(t)/dt = α - βB(t) where B(t) is biomarker concentration at time t, α is production rate and β is elimination rate. 

5. Net Reclassification Improvement (NRI) = P(up|event) - P(down|event) + P(down|no event) - P(up|no event) for model performance evaluation. 

6. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI) = (Pₙₑw,ₑᵥₑₙₜₛ - Pₒₗₐ,ₑᵥₑₙₜₛ) - (Pₙₑw,ₙₒₙ₋ₑᵥₑₙₜₛ - Pₒₗₐ,ₙₒₙ₋ₑᵥₑₙₜₛ) for discrimination power. 

7. Renal perfusion pressure (RPP) = MAP - CVP, with critical threshold RPP_critical = 60 mmHg. 

8. Conditional probability model: P(Renal Failure|biomarker > threshold, risk factors) = P(biomarker > threshold|Renal Failure, risk factors) × P(Renal Failure|risk factors) / P(biomarker > threshold|risk factors)

El modelo debe clasificar a los pacientes en estratos de riesgo, ofrecer orientación clínica procesable y validarse contra sistemas de estadificación establecidos (KDIGO, Akin, Rifle). Analice los patrones temporales de los indicadores de la función renal y su asociación con las variables hemodinámicas para determinar el tiempo de intervención óptima. Para cada paciente, calcule las probabilidades de desarrollar insuficiencia renal en estadio 1, 2 o 3 dentro de los 7 días posteriores a la cirugía, incluidos los intervalos de confianza.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Multivariate Logistic Regression Model for renal failure risk prediction: log(P(renal failure)/(1-P(renal failure))) = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ where Xₙ represents preoperative risk factors, intraoperative parameters, and indicators. 

2. Cox Proportional Hazards Model for time-to-renal failure: h(t) = h₀(t)exp(β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ) where h₀(t) is the baseline hazard function. 

3. Random Forest classification algorithm with feature importance metric I(X) = ∑ᵣp(τ)Δi(s,τ) where p(τ) is the proportion of samples reaching node τ and Δi(s,τ) is the impurity decrease. 

4. Temporal indicator dynamics: dB(t)/dt = α - βB(t) where B(t) is indicator concentration at time t, α is production rate and β is elimination rate. 

5. Net Reclassification Improvement (NRI) = P(up|event) - P(down|event) + P(down|no event) - P(up|no event) for model performance evaluation. 

6. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI) = (Pₙₑw,ₑᵥₑₙₜₛ - Pₒₗₐ,ₑᵥₑₙₜₛ) - (Pₙₑw,ₙₒₙ₋ₑᵥₑₙₜₛ - Pₒₗₐ,ₙₒₙ₋ₑᵥₑₙₜₛ) for discrimination power. 

7. Renal perfusion pressure (RPP) = MAP - CVP, with critical threshold RPP_critical = 60 mmHg. 

8. Conditional probability model: P(renal failure|indicator > threshold, risk factors) = P(indicator > threshold|renal failure, risk factors) × P(renal failure|risk factors) / P(indicator > threshold|risk factors)

El modelo debe clasificar a los pacientes en grupos de riesgo, ofrecer umbrales de intervención clínica procesable y ser validado contra sistemas de clasificación clínica establecidas (KDIGO, AKIN, Rifle). Analice los cambios dependientes del tiempo en los marcadores de la función renal y su relación con las variables hemodinámicas para identificar el tiempo óptimo para las intervenciones. task_details.task_instructions: Cree un modelo de evaluación de riesgos probabilístico robusto para predecir el inicio de la lesión pulmonar aguda (ALI) en pacientes críticos diagnosticados con infección SARS-CoV-2 dentro de las 72 horas posteriores a la admisión de la unidad de cuidados intensivos (UCI).  El modelo debe incorporar factores clínicos, resultados de laboratorio, marcadores genéticos, hallazgos radiológicos y métricas de apoyo respiratorio. Identifique el peso óptimo para cada factor, defina los umbrales para los niveles de riesgo (bajo, moderado, alto), calcule valores predictivos positivos y negativos, y evalúe el rendimiento del modelo utilizando técnicas estadísticas apropiadas como el área bajo la curva característica operativa del receptor (AUROC), la mejora de la discriminación integrada (IDI) y el análisis de la curva de decisión.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
The ALI prediction model will use a multivariate logistic regression model with regularization:

P(ALI) = 1 / (1 + e^(-z))

where z = β₀ + β₁x₁ + β₂x₂ + ... + βₙxₙ + Σᵢⱼ γᵢⱼ(xᵢxⱼ) + ε

where:
- β₀ is the intercept
- βᵢ are the coefficients for each predictor variable xᵢ
- γᵢⱼ are interaction terms between selected variables
- ε is the error term

The model will utilize LASSO regularization to mitigate overfitting:

min{-L(β) + λΣ|βᵢ|}

where L(β) is the log-likelihood function and λ is the regularization parameter.

To assess feature importance, compute the standardized odds ratios:
OR(xᵢ) = e^(βᵢ × SD(xᵢ))

For risk stratification thresholds, identify optimal cutpoints using Youden's index:
J = max{sensitivity(c) + specificity(c) - 1} for all possible cutpoints c

The model's discrimination will be evaluated using the AUROC:
AUROC = P(score(case) > score(control))

Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI) calculation:
IDI = (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)new model - (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)old model

Calibration will be assessed using the Hosmer-Lemeshow test statistic:
H = Σ[(Oᵢ - Eᵢ)²/Eᵢ(1-Eᵢ/nᵢ)]

where Oᵢ is observed events, Eᵢ is expected events, and nᵢ is number of observations in group i.

task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo predictivo bayesiano integral para estimar la probabilidad de deterioro renal postoperatorio después de la cirugía cardíaca.  El modelo debe incorporar factores preoperatorios, intraoperatorios y postoperatorios para pronosticar el desarrollo de insuficiencia renal dentro de las 48 horas posteriores al procedimiento quirúrgico. Realice la selección de características con una justificación clara, proporcione distribuciones de probabilidad condicionales completas, calcule las relaciones de probabilidad y valida la precisión del modelo utilizando medidas estadísticas adecuadas. Finalmente, aplique el modelo para analizar tres casos de pacientes proporcionados, proporcionando una explicación detallada de las probabilidades predichas.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Bayesian Model Formulation:
   P(Renal Failure|X) = P(X|Renal Failure)P(Renal Failure)/P(X)
   where X is the vector of predictor variables

2. Logistic Regression Component:
   logit[P(Renal Failure|X)] = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ
   where βᵢ are the regression coefficients

3. Feature Selection using LASSO Regularization:
   min_β [L(β) + λ∑|βᵢ|]
   where L(β) is the negative log-likelihood and λ is the regularization parameter

4. Naïve Bayes Component for Biomarkers:
   P(X|Renal Failure) = ∏P(Xᵢ|Renal Failure)
   assumes conditional independence between features

5. Model Calibration Assessment:
   Hosmer-Lemeshow Test: χ² = ∑[(Oᵢ - Eᵢ)²/Eᵢ(1-Eᵢ/nᵢ)]
   where Oᵢ is observed events and Eᵢ is expected events in group i

6. Discrimination Metrics:
   a. Area Under ROC Curve: AUC = ∫ TPR(FPR⁻¹(t))dt
   b. Net Reclassification Index: NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]
   c. Integrated Discrimination Improvement: IDI = (μₙₑw,₁ - μₙₑw,₀) - (μₒₗₐ,₁ - μₒₗₐ,₀)

7. Time-dependent Risk Calculation:
   P(Renal Failure within time t|X) = 1 - S(t|X)
   where S(t|X) is the survival function

8. Probability Threshold Optimization:
   max_c [w₁·Sensitivity(c) + w₂·Specificity(c)]
   where c is the classification threshold and w₁,w₂ are weights

9. Net Benefit Assessment:
   Net Benefit = TPR - (FPR × pt/(1-pt))
   where pt is the probability threshold

Le système utilisera les résultats de l'imagerie, les facteurs de risque des patients et les niveaux de marqueur tumoral pour catégoriser les lésions par leur probabilité d'être cancéreux.  Vos tâches sont: 1) Analyser les données des patients fournies, 2) construire un réseau bayésien pour estimer les probabilités, 3) développer un arbre de décision en utilisant des directives établies (Fleischner Society, ACCP, NCCN), 4) créer un schéma de stratification des risques qui fournit une probabilité post-test de tumeinte et 5) établir des stratégies de gestion des risques basées sur la stratification des risques.

low_risk_solid_nodule.>8mm: Consider CT at 3 months, PET/CT, or tissue sampling

high_risk_solid_nodule.6-8mm: CT at 6-12 months, then at 18-24 months

feature_weights.smoking_coefficient: 0.03 × pack_years for current smokers, 0.02 × pack_years for former smokers

task_details.task_instructions: Cree un modelo matemático preciso para pronosticar la probabilidad de supervivencia a 5 años en individuos diagnosticados con carcinoma hepatocelular avanzado (CHC) después de la quimioembolización arterial del transcatéter (TACE) en conjunto con la ablación por radiofrecuencia (RFA).  El modelo debe integrar la demografía del paciente, las características tumorales, los resultados de los análisis de sangre, las condiciones coexistentes, los regímenes de tratamiento e indicadores genéticos/moleculares. El modelo debe tener en cuenta los riesgos competitivos, las covariables dependientes del tiempo y la interacción no lineal entre las variables.  Valide el modelo utilizando los datos proporcionados, calcule las métricas de rendimiento relevantes y realice análisis de sensibilidad para identificar los factores pronósticos más significativos.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Survival Analysis Framework:
   S(t) = P(T > t) = exp(-∫₀ᵗ h(u)du)
   where S(t) is the survival function, h(t) is the hazard rate

2. Cox Proportional Hazards Model with Time-Varying Covariates:
   h(t|X(t)) = h₀(t)exp(β₁X₁ + β₂X₂(t) + ... + βₚXₚ(t))
   where h₀(t) is the baseline hazard rate, X(t) are time-dependent covariates

3. Competing Risks Framework:
   CIF_j(t) = ∫₀ᵗ S(u-)h_j(u)du
   where CIF_j(t) is the cumulative incidence function for cause j

4. Joint Longitudinal-Survival Model:
   Y_i(t) = m_i(t) + ε_i(t) = X_i(t)β + Z_i(t)b_i + ε_i(t)
   h_i(t) = h₀(t)exp(γᵀW_i + αm_i(t))
   where Y_i(t) represents longitudinal biomarkers, and h_i(t) is the hazard rate

5. Non-linear Interaction Terms:
   g(X) = Σ_j β_j X_j + Σ_j,k β_j,k X_j X_k + Σ_j β_j² X_j² + Σ_j f_j(X_j)
   where f_j are smooth functions modeled via cubic splines

6. Random Survival Forests:
   Mortality(X) = ∫ I(t≤T)dF̂(t|X)
   where F̂ is the cumulative hazard estimate from the ensemble

7. Model Performance Metrics:
   C-index = P(T_i > T_j | pred_i > pred_j, δⱼ = 1)
   Brier Score = (1/n)Σᵢ(I(T_i > t) - Ŝ(t|X_i))²
   Time-dependent AUC = P(π_i > π_j | I(T_i > t) = 1, I(T_j > t) = 0)

8. Calibration Assessment:
   Expected/Observed Ratio = E[S(t)]/O[S(t)]

9. Variable Importance:
   VIMP_j = Err_j* - Err
   where Err_j* is the prediction error with variable j randomly permuted

task_details.task_instructions: Cree un modelo integral de predicción de riesgo multivariado para eventos respiratorios postoperatorios (Pres) después de una cirugía no cardíaca.  El modelo debe usar factores preoperatorios, intraoperatorios y postoperatorios tempranos.  Cuantifique la importancia relativa de cada factor, defina los umbrales de riesgo clínicamente significativos, calcule el área bajo la curva característica operativa del receptor (AUROC) y calcule la mejora de la reclasificación neta (NRI) contra la puntuación de comorbilidad Elixhauser establecida. Valide internamente el modelo con remuestreo de arranque de arranque (1000 iteraciones) y evalúe la calibración utilizando la prueba de bondad de ajuste Hosmer-Lemeshow.  Finalmente, produzca un nomograma para la aplicación clínica y calcule los puntajes de riesgo individualizados para cada paciente en el conjunto de validación.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Multivariate Logistic Regression Model:
   log(p/(1-p)) = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ
   Where p is the probability of developing a PRE, βᵢ are the regression coefficients, and Xᵢ are the predictor variables.

2. Model Performance Metrics:
   a. AUROC calculation: AUROC = P(score(positive case) > score(negative case))
   b. Hosmer-Lemeshow test: H = Σ((Oᵢ - Eᵢ)²/Eᵢ(1-Eᵢ/nᵢ)), where Oᵢ is observed events, Eᵢ is expected events
   c. Net Reclassification Improvement (NRI): NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]
   d. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI): IDI = (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)new model - (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)old model

3. Variable Selection via LASSO regularization:
   min[Σ(-yᵢlog(pᵢ) - (1-yᵢ)log(1-pᵢ)) + λΣ|βⱼ|]
   where λ is the regularization parameter determined by cross-validation

4. Internal Validation Procedure:
   a. Bootstrap resampling (1000 iterations)
   b. For each bootstrap sample i:
      - Fit model to bootstrap sample
      - Calculate performance metrics on bootstrap sample (apparent performance)
      - Apply model to original sample and calculate performance (test performance)
      - Calculate optimism as difference between apparent and test performance
   c. Optimism-corrected performance = original performance - average optimism

5. Risk Score Calculation:
   a. For each variable j, points = Round(βⱼ(Xⱼ - Xⱼ,min)/(B × s))
      where B is the number of points corresponding to one regression unit
      and s is a scaling factor
   b. Total risk score = Σ(pointsⱼ)
   c. Predicted probability of PRE: p = 1/(1 + exp(-α₀ - B × Total risk score/s))
      where α₀ is the intercept of the logistic regression model

task_details.task_instructions: Créez un modèle complet de prédiction des risques multivariés pour les complications respiratoires postopératoires (PRC) après une chirurgie non cardiaque.  Le modèle doit intégrer des facteurs postopératoires préopératoires, peropératoires et précoces.  Quantifier la contribution relative de chaque variable, définir les seuils de risque cliniquement significatifs, calculer la zone sous la courbe caractéristique de fonctionnement du récepteur (AUROC) et calculer l'amélioration du reclassement net (NRI) par rapport au score CRISC établi. Valider en interne le modèle à l'aide d'un rééchantillonnage de bootstrap (1000 itérations) et évaluer l'étalonnage avec le test de bonté Hosmer-Lemeshow. Enfin, générez un nomogramme pour une utilisation clinique et calculez les scores de risque individualisés pour chaque patient dans l'ensemble de validation.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Multivariate Logistic Regression Model:
   log(p/(1-p)) = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ
   Where p is the probability of developing a PRC, βᵢ are the regression coefficients, and Xᵢ are the predictor variables.

2. Model Performance Metrics:
   a. AUROC calculation: AUROC = P(score(positive case) > score(negative case))
   b. Hosmer-Lemeshow test: H = Σ((Oᵢ - Eᵢ)²/Eᵢ(1-Eᵢ/nᵢ)), where Oᵢ is observed events, Eᵢ is expected events
   c. Net Reclassification Improvement (NRI): NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]
   d. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI): IDI = (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)new model - (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)old model

3. Variable Selection via LASSO regularization:
   min[Σ(-yᵢlog(pᵢ) - (1-yᵢ)log(1-pᵢ)) + λΣ|βⱼ|]
   where λ is the regularization parameter determined by cross-validation

4. Internal Validation Procedure:
   a. Bootstrap resampling (1000 iterations)
   b. For each bootstrap sample i:
      - Fit model to bootstrap sample
      - Calculate performance metrics on bootstrap sample (apparent performance)
      - Apply model to original sample and calculate performance (test performance)
      - Calculate optimism as difference between apparent and test performance
   c. Optimism-corrected performance = original performance - average optimism

5. Risk Score Calculation:
   a. For each variable j, points = Round(βⱼ(Xⱼ - Xⱼ,min)/(B × s))
      where B is the number of points corresponding to one regression unit
      and s is a scaling factor
   b. Total risk score = Σ(pointsⱼ)
   c. Predicted probability of PRC: p = 1/(1 + exp(-α₀ - B × Total risk score/s))
      where α₀ is the intercept of the logistic regression model

task_details.task_instructions: Cree un modelo integral de predicción de riesgo multivariado para complicaciones respiratorias posquirúrgicas (PRC) después de las operaciones no cardíacas.  El modelo debe usar factores preoperatorios, intraoperatorios y postoperatorios tempranos.  Cuantifique la contribución de cada factor, defina los umbrales de riesgo clínicamente significativos, calcule el área bajo la curva característica operativa del receptor (AUROC) y calcule la mejora de la reclasificación neta (NRI) en relación con el puntaje de comorbilidad Elixhauser establecido. Validen internamente el modelo con el remuestreo de arranque bootstrap (1000 iteraciones) y verifique la calibración con la prueba de bondad de ajuste Hosmer-Lemeshow. Finalmente, produzca un nomograma para el uso clínico y calcule las puntuaciones de riesgo individual para cada paciente en el conjunto de validación.

task_details.task_instructions: Créez un diagnostic différentiel complet et un algorithme de soutien à la décision clinique pour un patient présentant des symptômes systémiques et une présentation clinique peu claire. Identifiez le diagnostic primaire le plus probable, calculez le pré-test et la probabilité post-test pour chaque considération diagnostique, recommande une stratégie de diagnostic fondée sur des preuves avec des sensibilités et des spécificités de test appropriées et concevoir un régime de traitement, tenant compte des facteurs pharmacocinétiques et des interactions médicamenteuses potentielles entre les médicaments prescrits.  Incorporez des comorbidités, des facteurs génétiques et des données démographiques dans votre évaluation.

environmental_exposures: Recent travel to Eastern Mediterranean region (3 months prior)

chief_complaints: Progressive shortness of breath (NYHA Class III) over 6 weeks
Migratory polyarthralgia primarily affecting small joints
15 kg unintentional weight loss over 4 months

physical_examination.general: Cachectic female exhibiting moderate respiratory distress
physical_examination.HEENT: Mild palpebral pallor, no jaundice, oral mucosal petechiae
physical_examination.respiratory: Bilateral basilar crackles, decreased breath sounds in right lower zone
physical_examination.cardiovascular: Tachycardic, S3 heart sound, 2/6 systolic murmur at apex
physical_examination.abdominal: Hepatomegaly (4 cm below costal margin), splenomegaly (2 cm)
physical_examination.skin: Purpuric lesions on lower extremities, absence of digital clubbing
physical_examination.musculoskeletal: Synovitis of metacarpophalangeal and proximal interphalangeal joints bilaterally
physical_examination.neurological: Mild peripheral sensory neuropathy with stocking distribution

hematology.peripheral_smear: Microcytic hypochromic anemia, occasional fragmented red blood cells

urinalysis.casts: Granular and red blood cell casts present

imaging_studies.chest_xray: Bilateral interstitial infiltrates, right-sided small pleural effusion
imaging_studies.chest_CT: Ground-glass opacities with interlobular septal thickening in bilateral lower lobes, small right pleural effusion, mediastinal lymphadenopathy
imaging_studies.echocardiogram: EF 48%, moderate mitral regurgitation, mild pulmonary hypertension (RVSP 45 mmHg), no vegetation
imaging_studies.abdominal_ultrasound: Hepatosplenomegaly, increased echogenicity of renal parenchyma bilaterally

mathematical_formulation.pre_test_probability: P(D) = prevalence of disease in similar demographic with these risk factors
mathematical_formulation.bayesian_updating: Updated P(D) after each test becomes the pre-test probability for the next test
mathematical_formulation.drug_interaction_risk: Risk score = Σ(severity_factor × evidence_quality × mechanism_certainty) for each drug pair
mathematical_formulation.pneumocystis_prophylaxis_threshold: Initiate if CD4 < 200 cells/mm³ or CD4% < 14%

task_details.task_instructions: Erstellen Sie ein prädiktives Modell für die Entwicklung von Nierenversagen bei kritisch kranken Patienten mit systemischer Infektion. Das Modell sollte: 1) frühe Indikatoren und klinische Faktoren, die Nierenversagen innerhalb von 48 Stunden prognostizieren, 2) Patienten in Risikogruppen mit assoziierten Wahrscheinlichkeitsschätzungen kategorisieren. Vorbeugende Behandlungen auf der Grundlage der Risikostratifizierung.

mathematical_formulation.risk_prediction_model: P(Kidney Failure within 48h) = logit^-1(β₀ + ∑ᵢβᵢXᵢ + ∑ⱼβⱼXⱼ(t) + ∑ₖ∑ₗβₖₗXₖXₗ), where Xᵢ are time-invariant features, Xⱼ(t) are time-varying features, and XₖXₗ are interaction terms
mathematical_formulation.time_varying_covariates: For time-varying covariates Xⱼ(t), we employ joint models that simultaneously model the longitudinal process: Xⱼ(t) = mⱼ(t) + εⱼ(t) where mⱼ(t) is the true underlying value and εⱼ(t) is measurement error, with the survival process: h(t) = h₀(t)exp(γᵀZ + α·mⱼ(t))
mathematical_formulation.feature_selection: LASSO regression with penalty term λ: min(∑ᵢ(yᵢ - β₀ - ∑ⱼβⱼxᵢⱼ)² + λ∑ⱼ|βⱼ|)
mathematical_formulation.competing_risks: Subdistribution hazard model for Kidney Failure in presence of competing risk (death): λₛⱼ(t) = λ₀ₛⱼ(t)exp(βᵀₛⱼX), where s indexes the risk (Kidney Failure or death) and j indexes the patient

validation_metrics.calibration: Hosmer-Lemeshow statistic: H = ∑ᵍₖ₌₁((Oₖ - Eₖ)²/Eₖ), where Oₖ are observed events and Eₖ are expected events in the kth risk decile
validation_metrics.reclassification: Net Reclassification Index (NRI) = P(up|event) - P(down|event) + P(down|no event) - P(up|no event)
validation_metrics.decision_curve: Net Benefit = (True Positives - w·False Positives)/n, where w is the weight defined as pt/(1-pt) and pt is the probability threshold

mathematical_formulation.drug_interaction_model: Pairwise drug interaction terms with multiplicative effects: P(Kidney Failure|Drug A, Drug B) = P₀·RR_A·RR_B·ψ, where ψ is the interaction coefficient
mathematical_formulation.dynamic_risk_updates: Bayesian sequential updating where posterior risk P(Kidney Failure|Xᵗ) ∝ P(Xᵗ|Kidney Failure)·P(Kidney Failure|Xᵗ⁻¹) where Xᵗ represents features at time t
mathematical_formulation.number_needed_to_treat: NNT = 1/(P(Kidney Failure|high risk, no intervention) - P(Kidney Failure|high risk, intervention)) = 1/ARR

task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo de predicción integral para el desarrollo de deterioro renal en pacientes críticos con infección sistémica. El modelo debe: 1) identificar los indicadores biológicos tempranos y las mediciones clínicas que pronostican el inicio de deterioro renal dentro de las 48 horas, 2) clasificar a los pacientes en grupos de riesgo con estimaciones de probabilidad asociadas, 3) explicar la cuenta de las variables dependientes del tiempo en los datos del paciente, 4) factorizar las interacciones de fármacos que podrían empeorar la nefrotoxicidad, 5) ofrecer la importancia de las características que pueden utilizar los clínicos para utilizar para utilizar el tratamiento y 6) y 6) y 6). Trate (NNT) para obtener varios tratamientos preventivos dependiendo de la estratificación del riesgo.

task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo predictivo integral para estimar la probabilidad de mortalidad de 90 días en individuos con insuficiencia hepática severa utilizando métricas clínicas, marcadores séricos e índices de comorbilidad.  El modelo debe integrar fluctuaciones temporales en las puntuaciones de gravedad de la falla orgánica, considerar los riesgos competitivos, clasificar a los pacientes en grupos de riesgo distintos y corroborar los hallazgos con sistemas de puntuación establecidos (MELD, MELD-NA, CTP). El modelo resultante debe producir evaluaciones de riesgo de mortalidad personalizada, acompañadas de gráficos de calibración y análisis de curva de decisión para mostrar la aplicabilidad clínica.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Cox Proportional Hazards Model with time-varying covariates:
   h(t|X(t)) = h₀(t)exp(β₁X₁(t) + β₂X₂(t) + ... + βₚXₚ(t))
   where h₀(t) is the baseline hazard function, X(t) are time-dependent covariates, and β are regression coefficients.

2. Fine-Gray Competing Risks Model:
   h_j(t|X) = h₀ⱼ(t)exp(β₁ⱼX₁ + β₂ⱼX₂ + ... + βₚⱼXₚ)
   where j denotes the cause-specific hazard for outcome j.

3. Dynamic hepatic insufficiency prediction model incorporating delta-SOFA:
   logit(P(death at 90 days)) = α + β₁(baseline variables) + β₂(ΔSOFA₀₋₃) + β₃(ΔSOFA₃₋₇) + β₄(comorbidity index) + error

4. Model Calibration: Hosmer-Lemeshow test with H statistic:
   H = Σ [(O_g - E_g)² / (n_g × p_g × (1-p_g))]
   where O_g is observed events, E_g is expected events in group g

5. Discrimination metrics: C-statistic calculation:
   C = P(score(case₁) > score(case₂) | case₁ had event, case₂ did not)

6. Net Reclassification Index (NRI):
   NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]

7. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI):
   IDI = (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)new model - (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)old model

task_details.task_instructions: Erstellen Sie ein umfassendes Vorhersagemodell zur Schätzung des 90-Tage-Mortalitätsrisikos bei Personen mit schwerer Leberinsuffizienz unter Verwendung klinischer Metriken, serologischen Marker und Komorbiditätsmaßnahmen.  Das Modell sollte Schwankungen in die Bewertungswerte der Organversagen integrieren, konkurrierende Mortalitätsursachen berücksichtigen, Patienten in unterschiedliche Risikogruppen schichten und gegen vorhandene Prognosesysteme (MELD, MELD-NA, CTP) validiert werden. Das endgültige Modell sollte personalisierte Vorhersagen der Sterblichkeitswahrscheinlichkeit anbieten, die von Kalibrierungsdiagrammen und Entscheidungskurvenanalysen begleitet werden, um die klinische Anwendbarkeit zu bestätigen.

   NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]

7. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI):
   IDI = (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)new model - (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)old model

task_details.task_instructions: Construisez un modèle prédictif complet pour estimer le risque de mortalité à 90 jours chez les personnes atteintes d'insuffisance hépatique sévère en utilisant des caractéristiques cliniques, des marqueurs sérologiques et des indices de comorbidité.  Le modèle doit tenir compte des changements dans les scores d'échec des organes au fil du temps, considérer les risques concurrents, stratifier les patients en groupes de risque cliniquement pertinents et être validé contre les systèmes de notation établis (MELD, MELD-NA, CTP). Le modèle final doit fournir des estimations de probabilité de mortalité individualisées, accompagnées de graphiques d'étalonnage et d'analyse de la courbe de décision pour présenter sa valeur pratique.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Cox Proportional Hazards Model with time-varying covariates:
   h(t|X(t)) = h₀(t)exp(β₁X₁(t) + β₂X₂(t) + ... + βₚXₚ(t))
   where h₀(t) is the baseline hazard function, X(t) are time-dependent covariates, and β are regression coefficients.

2. Fine-Gray Competing Risks Model:
   h_j(t|X) = h₀ⱼ(t)exp(β₁ⱼX₁ + β₂ⱼX₂ + ... + βₚⱼXₚ)
   where j denotes the cause-specific hazard for outcome j.

3. Dynamic hepatic insufficiency prediction model incorporating delta-SOFA:
   logit(P(death at 90 days)) = α + β₁(baseline variables) + β₂(ΔSOFA₀₋₃) + β₃(ΔSOFA₃₋₇) + β₄(comorbidity index) + error

4. Model Calibration: Hosmer-Lemeshow test with H statistic:
   H = Σ [(O_g - E_g)² / (n_g × p_g × (1-p_g))]
   where O_g is observed events, E_g is expected events in group g

5. Discrimination metrics: C-statistic calculation:
   C = P(score(case₁) > score(case₂) | case₁ had event, case₂ did not)

6. Net Reclassification Index (NRI):
   NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]

7. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI):
   IDI = (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)new model - (mean predicted probability in events - mean predicted probability in non-events)old model

task_details.task_instructions: Desarrolle un diagnóstico diferencial integral para un caso complicado de pirexia de origen indeterminado (PUO), incluida una clasificación basada en la probabilidad de cada causa potencial, basada en un análisis completo de la presentación clínica del paciente, los resultados de laboratorio y los datos de imágenes.  Para cada diagnóstico potencial, proporcione una explicación fisiopatológica detallada que conecta las manifestaciones clínicas con el proceso de enfermedad subyacente, especifique pruebas de diagnóstico adicionales adecuadas con resultados anticipados y describe una estrategia de tratamiento basada en evidencia. El análisis debe incorporar métodos bayesianos para ajustar las estimaciones de probabilidad a medida que los nuevos datos clínicos estén disponibles y deben tener en cuenta la posibilidad de múltiples etiologías simultáneas.

task_data.presenting_complaint: Persistent pyrexia >38.3°C (101°F) for 4 weeks with systemic symptoms

physical_examination.abdominal: Hepatomegaly (2 cm below costal margin), mild splenomegaly, right upper quadrant tenderness

imaging_studies.abdominal_ultrasonography: Hepatomegaly with heterogeneous echotexture, mild splenomegaly (13.2 cm), no focal lesions, mild ascites, no biliary dilation

mathematical_formulation.bayesian_framework: For each potential diagnosis D given the clinical evidence E, calculate P(D|E) = [P(E|D) × P(D)] / P(E), where P(D) is the prior probability based on epidemiology and patient factors, P(E|D) is the likelihood of observing the clinical evidence given the disease, and P(E) is the total probability of the evidence across all possible diagnoses.
mathematical_formulation.likelihood_calculation: For each finding f in the set of clinical evidence E and each diagnosis D, estimate P(f|D) based on literature and clinical experience. Combine these probabilities using the naive Bayes assumption: P(E|D) = Π P(f|D) for all f in E.
mathematical_formulation.probability_updating: As new evidence e becomes available, update the posterior probability using Bayes' theorem: P(D|E,e) = [P(e|D) × P(D|E)] / P(e|E)
mathematical_formulation.multifactorial_consideration: For considering multiple concurrent diagnoses Di and Dj, calculate P(Di ∩ Dj|E) by accounting for potential dependence between diagnoses: P(Di ∩ Dj|E) = P(Di|E) × P(Dj|E, Di)

test_performance_metrics.post_test_probability: Post-test odds = pre-test odds × likelihood ratio; Post-test probability = post-test odds/(1 + post-test odds)

task_details.task_instructions: Créez un algorithme de diagnostic pour les patients présentant des douleurs au flanc aiguë aux urgences.  L'algorithme doit utiliser les observations cliniques, les résultats du laboratoire, l'imagerie médicale et les antécédents du patient pour produire une liste prioritaire de diagnostics possibles avec des risques associés.  L'algorithme doit tenir compte de l'interaction complexe des symptômes, suivre la progression de la condition au fil du temps et ajuster dynamiquement les probabilités à mesure que de nouvelles informations deviennent disponibles.  L'algorithme doit prendre en charge les décisions des prochains tests de diagnostic ou interventions appropriés.  La sortie finale doit contenir: 1) une liste classée de diagnostics possibles avec des estimations de probabilité, 2) des preuves de soutien et de réfutation clés pour chaque diagnostic, 3) des recommandations pour une évaluation diagnostique supplémentaire avec des justifications et 4) des stratégies de gestion initiales pour les diagnostics les plus probables.

surgical_history: right total knee arthroplasty (3 years ago)

presenting_complaint.location: right flank, radiating to right lower quadrant

physical_examination.respiratory: clear bilateral breath sounds, no respiratory distress

abdominal.palpation: marked tenderness in RLQ with rebound and guarding, positive McBurney's point tenderness, positive psoas sign, positive obturator sign
abdominal.percussion: tympanitic, pain with percussion over RLQ

physical_examination.neurological: alert and oriented x3, no focal deficits

abdominal_radiograph.findings: No evidence of free air, no bowel obstruction, nonspecific bowel gas pattern, no abnormal calcifications

abdominal_ultrasound.findings: Status post cholecystectomy. Moderate right hydronephrosis with hydroureter to the level of the iliac vessels. 7mm calculus visualized at right ureterovesical junction. No visualization of appendix due to bowel gas. No evidence of free fluid.

non-contrast_CT_abdomen_pelvis.findings: 7mm calcification at right ureterovesical junction with moderate right hydronephrosis and hydroureter. Stranding in right lower quadrant with thickened appendix (10mm diameter) containing appendicolith. Periappendiceal fat stranding and small amount of free fluid around the appendix. No evidence of perforation. No evidence of diverticulitis. Status post cholecystectomy.

time_course.pain_migration: Started periumbilical, migrated to RLQ over 4 hours

mathematical_formulation.bayesian_probability: For each potential diagnosis (D_i), given a set of clinical findings (F), P(D_i|F) = [P(F|D_i) × P(D_i)] / P(F), where P(D_i) is the prior probability of disease i, P(F|D_i) is the likelihood of findings given disease i, and P(F) is the probability of findings across all possible diagnoses.
mathematical_formulation.likelihood_functions: For continuous variables (lab values, vital signs), likelihood L(D_i|x) = f(x|D_i) where f is the probability density function for variable x given disease D_i, often modeled as normal distributions with disease-specific means and standard deviations.
mathematical_formulation.diagnostic_test_characteristics: Sensitivity = true positives / (true positives + false negatives); Specificity = true negatives / (true negatives + false positives); Positive Predictive Value = true positives / (true positives + false positives); Negative Predictive Value = true negatives / (true negatives + false negatives); Likelihood Ratio Positive = sensitivity / (1-specificity); Likelihood Ratio Negative = (1-sensitivity) / specificity
mathematical_formulation.sequential_probability_updates: After each new finding or test result T, P(D_i|F,T) = P(D_i|F) × P(T|D_i,F) / P(T|F), where P(T|D_i,F) is the probability of test result T given disease D_i and previous findings F
mathematical_formulation.diagnostic_threshold_equations: For decision to pursue additional testing: Threshold probability = (Cost of Test) / (Benefit of Treatment × Effectiveness of Treatment)

risk_stratification_scores.Alvarado_Score: Sum of points (0-10): Migration of pain (1), Anorexia (1), Nausea/vomiting (1), RLQ tenderness (2), Rebound pain (1), Elevated temperature (1), Leukocytosis (2), Left shift (1)
risk_stratification_scores.STONE_Score: For nephrolithiasis prediction: Sum of points (0-13) based on Sex, Timing, Origin, Nausea, Erythrocytes
risk_stratification_scores.qSOFA: For sepsis risk: 1 point each for: Respiratory rate ≥22/min, Altered mentation, Systolic blood pressure ≤100 mmHg

mathematical_formulation.utility_function: U(Decision|D_i) = Σ[P(D_i|F) × Value(Outcome|D_i,Decision)] - Cost(Decision), where Decision represents diagnostic or therapeutic choices

task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo de predicción multivariante integral para la muerte hospitalaria en pacientes diagnosticados con tromboembolismo venoso (TEV) utilizando datos clínicos, de laboratorio y de imágenes.  El modelo debe integrar biomarcadores pertinentes, comorbilidades, mediciones fisiológicas y resultados de imágenes para clasificar a los pacientes en estratos de riesgo.  Además, realice una validación estadística exhaustiva, que abarca las métricas de calibración y discriminación, junto con el análisis de la curva de decisión.  Finalmente, compare el desempeño del modelo contra herramientas de evaluación de riesgos establecidas, como el índice de gravedad de la embolia pulmonar (PESI), PESI simplificado (SPESI) y el sistema de estratificación de riesgos de la Sociedad Europea de Cardiología (ESC).
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
1. Logistic Regression Model for Mortality Prediction:
   P(mortality) = 1/(1 + e^(-z))
   where z = β₀ + β₁x₁ + β₂x₂ + ... + βₙxₙ
   
2. Cox Proportional Hazards Model for Time-to-Event Analysis:
   h(t) = h₀(t) × exp(β₁x₁ + β₂x₂ + ... + βₙxₙ)
   where h₀(t) is the baseline hazard function
   
3. Model Discrimination Metrics:
   - Area Under Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve (AUROC):
     AUROC = P(score(positive case) > score(negative case))
   - Sensitivity = TP/(TP+FN)
   - Specificity = TN/(TN+FP)
   
4. Model Calibration Metrics:
   - Hosmer-Lemeshow Test: Χ² = Σ (Observed - Expected)²/Expected
   - Brier Score: BS = (1/N) Σ (fᵢ - oᵢ)²
     where fᵢ is the predicted probability and oᵢ is the actual outcome
   
5. Decision Curve Analysis Net Benefit:
   NB = (TP/n) - (FP/n) × (pt/(1-pt))
   where pt is the probability threshold
   
6. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI):
   IDI = (1/n₁) Σ (p'ᵢ - pᵢ)₁ - (1/n₀) Σ (p'ᵢ - pᵢ)₀
   where p'ᵢ is the predicted probability from the new model and pᵢ from the old model
   
7. Net Reclassification Improvement (NRI):
   NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]

task_details.task_instructions: Créez un modèle de prédiction multivarié complet pour la dysfonction cognitive postopératoire (POCD) chez les personnes âgées subissant une chirurgie cardiaque approfondie, incorporant des facteurs de risque préopératoires, des facteurs périopératoires et des marqueurs inflammatoires.  Le modèle doit classer les patients en groupes de risque, générer des estimations de probabilité individualisées avec des intervalles de confiance et recommander des stratégies préventives sur mesure basées sur des facteurs de risque modifiables. L'analyse doit tenir compte des interactions complexes entre les variables, inclure des estimations du temps au début de POCD et être validée à l'aide de ensembles de données indépendants, en abordant les variables de confusion potentielles.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
Logit(P(POCD)) = β₀ + Σ βᵢXᵢ + Σ Σ γᵢⱼXᵢXⱼ + Σ φᵢf(Xᵢ) + ε
Where:
- P(POCD) is the probability of developing postoperative cognitive dysfunction
- β₀ is the intercept term
- βᵢ are coefficients for individual predictors Xᵢ
- γᵢⱼ are interaction coefficients between variables Xᵢ and Xⱼ
- φᵢ are coefficients for non-linear transformations f(Xᵢ) of predictors
- ε is the error term

Time-to-POCD model using Cox proportional hazards:
h(t) = h₀(t)exp(Σ δᵢXᵢ)
Where:
- h(t) is the hazard function at time t
- h₀(t) is the baseline hazard function
- δᵢ are coefficients for predictors Xᵢ

Risk stratification thresholds:
- Low risk: P(POCD) < 0.15
- Moderate risk: 0.15 ≤ P(POCD) < 0.30
- High risk: 0.30 ≤ P(POCD) < 0.50
- Very high risk: P(POCD) ≥ 0.50

Model calibration assessment:
Hosmer-Lemeshow goodness-of-fit test: χ² = Σ(Observed - Expected)²/Expected

Discrimination metrics:
- AUC-ROC = P(score(case) > score(control))
- Brier score = (1/N)Σ(yᵢ - p̂ᵢ)²

Net Reclassification Improvement (NRI):
NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]

Decision curve analysis net benefit:
Net Benefit = (True positives/N) - (False positives/N) × (pt/(1-pt))
Where pt is the probability threshold

task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo de predicción multivariante integral para insuficiencia renal postoperatoria (RF) después de la cirugía cardíaca, utilizando factores de riesgo perioperatorios, variables hemodinámicas e indicadores clínicos.  El modelo debe clasificar a los pacientes en grupos de riesgos, generar estimaciones de probabilidad para variables severidades de RF (enfermedad renal: mejora de los resultados globales [KDIGO] etapas 1-3) e incluye un sistema de apoyo a la decisión para el momento óptimo de inicio de las modalidades de reemplazo renal (RRM). Calcule el índice de reclasificación neto (NRI) y las métricas integradas de mejora de la discriminación (IDI) en relación con los modelos establecidos de predicción de RF. Finalmente, desarrolle un plan de implementación clínica considerando limitaciones de recursos en diversos entornos hospitalarios.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
# Base Model
logit(P(RF)) = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ

# Model with Interactions
logit(P(RF)) = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ + γ₁(X₁×X₂) + γ₂(X₂×X₃) + ... + γₘ(Xᵢ×Xⱼ)

# Competing Risk Model for RRM initiation
λᵣ(t) = λ₀ᵣ(t)exp(β₁ᵣX₁ + β₂ᵣX₂ + ... + βₙᵣXₙ)
λₘ(t) = λ₀ₘ(t)exp(β₁ₘX₁ + β₂ₘX₂ + ... + βₙₘXₙ)
P(RRM by time t) = ∫₀ᵗ λᵣ(u)exp[-∫₀ᵘ(λᵣ(v) + λₘ(v))dv]du

# Risk Stratification
Low Risk: P(RF) < 0.15
Moderate Risk: 0.15 ≤ P(RF) < 0.35
High Risk: P(RF) ≥ 0.35

# Net Reclassification Improvement
NRI = [P(up|event) - P(down|event)] - [P(up|no event) - P(down|no event)]

# Integrated Discrimination Improvement
IDI = (1/n₁)∑ᵢ₌₁ⁿ¹(p̂ₙₑw,ᵢ - p̂ₒₗₐ,ᵢ) - (1/n₀)∑ᵢ₌₁ⁿ⁰(p̂ₙₑw,ᵢ - p̂ₒₗₐ,ᵢ)

# RRM Decision Algorithm
Initiate RRM if:
1. KDIGO Stage 3 AND [Fluid Overload > 10% OR K⁺ > 6.5 mmol/L OR pH < 7.2]
2. KDIGO Stage 2 AND [TIMP2×IGFBP7 > 2.0 AND Oliguria for >12 hours]
3. C-statistic for predicting 30-day mortality without RRM > 0.80

# Resource Allocation Optimization
Minimize: ∑ᵢωᵢ×resource_usageᵢ
Subject to: AUC of prediction model > 0.75
           Sensitivity for severe RF > 0.80
           Specificity for RRM need > 0.70

task_details.task_instructions: Construisez un modèle prédictif complet pour l'insuffisance hépatique après résection hépatique chez les patients atteints de carcinome hépatocellulaire (CHC) subissant une hépatectomie partielle. Le modèle doit incorporer des variables préopératoires, des paramètres peropératoires et des caractéristiques du patient.  Votre tâche consiste à: 1) analyser l'ensemble de données fourni pour identifier les prédicteurs significatifs de l'insuffisance hépatique; 2) Développer un modèle de régression logistique multivariable en utilisant des techniques de sélection de variables appropriées; 3) calculer les mesures de discrimination, d'étalonnage et d'utilité clinique; 4) Préparer les performances de votre modèle contre les indices établis tels que Meld, Child-Turcotte-Pugh et Albi; 5) explorer les mécanismes biologiques potentiels reliant les variables prédictives aux résultats; 6) Proposer un schéma de stratification à risque pratique basé sur le modèle dérivé; et 7) Discuter des implications pour les soins périopératoires.

task_data.complete_dataset: The complete dataset comprises 524 HCC patients who underwent hepatic resection between 2010-2022 at three high-volume hepatobiliary surgical centers.  The dataset includes 312 variables encompassing detailed laboratory results, volumetric measurements, functional liver tests, and outcomes. Hepatic insufficiency developed in 87 patients (16.6%) with the following distribution: Grade A (38 patients), Grade B (32 patients), Grade C (17 patients). 90-day mortality was 3.8%.

mathematical_formulation.logistic_regression_equation: logit(P(Hepatic Insufficiency)) = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ
mathematical_formulation.model_selection_criteria: Minimize AIC = -2ln(L) + 2k, where L is the likelihood and k is the number of parameters

calibration_metrics.calibration_slope: Calibration slope from logit(observed) = α + β × logit(predicted)

clinical_utility_metrics.net_benefit: Net Benefit = (True positives / n) - (False positives / n) × (pt / (1 - pt))
clinical_utility_metrics.decision_curve: Plot Net Benefit against threshold probability (pt)

mathematical_formulation.bootstrap_validation: For B bootstrap samples: Performance(original) - mean(Performance(bootstrap))
mathematical_formulation.recursive_feature_elimination: Remove features sequentially based on |βi| and re-evaluate model performance

task_details.task_instructions: Erstellen Sie ein prädiktives Modell für die Leberinsuffizienz nach Leberresektion bei Patienten mit hepatozellulärem Karzinom, die sich einer teilweisen Hepatektomie unterziehen.  Das Modell sollte präoperative Daten, intraoperative Variablen und Patientenmerkmale verwenden.  Ihre Aufgaben sind: 1) Analysieren Sie den Datensatz, um wichtige Prädiktoren für die Leberinsuffizienz zu finden. 2) Erstellen eines multivariablen logistischen Regressionsmodells mit geeigneten Variablenauswahlmethoden; 3) Diskriminierung, Kalibrierung und klinische Nutzungsmaßnahmen berechnen; 4) Benchmarke Ihr Modell gegen vorhandene Indizes wie Meldung, Kinder-Turcotte-Pugh und Albi-Scores; 5) potenzielle biologische Wege untersuchen, die Prädiktorvariablen und -ergebnisse verbinden; 6) aus dem Modell ein praktisches Risikostratifizierungsinstrument entwickeln; und 7) die Auswirkungen auf die perioperative Versorgung diskutieren.

task_data.complete_dataset: The complete dataset comprises 524 patients with HCC who underwent hepatic resection between 2010-2022 at three high-volume hepatobiliary centers.  The dataset includes 312 variables, encompassing detailed laboratory results, volumetric measurements, functional liver tests, and outcomes. Hepatic insufficiency occurred in 87 patients (16.6%) as follows: Grade A (38 patients), Grade B (32 patients), Grade C (17 patients). 90-day mortality was 3.8%.

mathematical_formulation.logistic_regression_equation: logit(P(Hepatic Insufficiency)) = β₀ + β₁X₁ + β₂X₂ + ... + βₙXₙ
mathematical_formulation.model_selection_criteria: Minimize AIC = -2ln(L) + 2k, where L is the likelihood and k is the number of parameters

calibration_metrics.calibration_slope: Calibration slope from logit(observed) = α + β × logit(predicted)

clinical_utility_metrics.net_benefit: Net Benefit = (True positives / n) - (False positives / n) × (pt / (1 - pt))
clinical_utility_metrics.decision_curve: Plot Net Benefit against threshold probability (pt)

mathematical_formulation.bootstrap_validation: For B bootstrap samples: Performance(original) - mean(Performance(bootstrap))
mathematical_formulation.recursive_feature_elimination: Remove features sequentially based on |βi| and re-evaluate model performance

task_details.task_instructions: Construya un modelo predictivo integral para la disfunción hepática posterior a la hepatectomía (PHLD) en pacientes diagnosticados con hepatocarcinoma (CHC) sometido a hepatectomía parcial.  El modelo debe integrar variables preoperatorias, parámetros intraoperatorios y rasgos del paciente.  Sus objetivos son: 1) analizar el conjunto de datos suministrado para identificar predictores de PHLD significativos; 2) desarrollar un modelo de regresión logística multivariable utilizando la selección de características apropiada; 3) calcular la discriminación, la calibración y las métricas de utilidad clínica; 4) compare el rendimiento de su modelo contra índices establecidos como puntajes MELD, CTP y GLD; 5) dilucidar posibles mecanismos biológicos que vinculan las variables predictoras con los resultados; 6) proponer una herramienta práctica de estratificación de riesgo basada en su modelo; y 7) discutir las implicaciones para la atención perioperatoria.

task_data.complete_dataset: The complete dataset comprises 524 HCC patients who underwent hepatic resection between 2010 and 2022 at three high-volume hepatobiliary centers.  The dataset contains 312 variables, encompassing comprehensive laboratory results, volumetric measurements, functional liver tests, and clinical outcomes. PHLD developed in 87 patients (16.6%), categorized as Grade A (38 patients), Grade B (32 patients), and Grade C (17 patients). 90-day mortality was 3.8%.

task_details.task_instructions: Erstellen Sie ein prädiktives Modell für die postoperative kognitive Dysfunktion (POCD) bei älteren Patienten, die sich einer größeren nicht kardialen Operation unter Verwendung präoperativer Risikofaktoren, intraoperativer Faktoren und pharmakogenetischer Marker unterziehen.  Das Modell wird Patienten nach Risiken geschichtet, Arzneimittel-Gen-Wechselwirkungen berücksichtigt und individuelle Präventionsstrategien anbietet.  Die Validierung wird gegen etablierte kognitive Beeinträchtigungskalen (Cam-ICU, Nu-DESC, 4AT) und abzielen, die auf eine überlegene Vorhersagegenauigkeit abzielen.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
The predictive model will use a multivariate logistic regression model:

log(P(POCD)/(1-P(POCD))) = β₀ + Σ(βᵢXᵢ) + Σ(γⱼZⱼ) + Σ(δₖGₖ) + Σ(λₘₙXₘZₙ) + Σ(θₚᵧXₚGᵧ)

Where:
- P(POCD) is the probability of postoperative cognitive dysfunction
- β₀ is the intercept
- βᵢ represents coefficients for preoperative factors Xᵢ
- γⱼ represents coefficients for intraoperative variables Zⱼ
- δₖ represents coefficients for pharmacogenomic markers Gₖ
- λₘₙ represents interaction coefficients between preoperative and intraoperative factors
- θₚᵧ represents interaction coefficients between clinical variables and genetic markers

Time-dependent effects will be modeled using Cox proportional hazards:

h(t) = h₀(t)exp(Σ(ωᵣVᵣ(t)))

Where:
- h(t) is the hazard function at time t
- h₀(t) is the baseline hazard function
- ωᵣ represents coefficients for time-varying covariates Vᵣ(t)

Model evaluation will use:
1. AUROC (Area Under Receiver Operating Characteristic) > 0.85
2. Sensitivity > 0.80
3. Specificity > 0.75
4. Net Reclassification Index (NRI) > 0.15 compared to existing models
5. Integrated Discrimination Improvement (IDI) > 0.10 compared to existing models
6. Calibration assessed by Hosmer-Lemeshow goodness-of-fit (p > 0.05)

task_details.task_instructions: Erstellen Sie ein prädiktives Modell für die postoperative kognitive Dysfunktion (POCD) bei älteren Erwachsenen, die sich schweren nicht kardialen Operationen unter Verwendung präoperativer Risikofaktoren, intraoperativen Parameter und pharmakogenetischen Marker unterziehen. Die Genauigkeit des Modells muss gegen etablierte kognitive Bewertungsinstrumente (CAM-ICU, NU-DESC, 4AT) validiert werden und zeigen überlegene Vorhersagekraft.

Where:

Le modèle doit classer les patients en groupes à risque, tenir compte des interactions entre les médicaments et les variations génétiques et proposer des stratégies préventives personnalisées.  La validation doit être effectuée contre les tests de fonction cognitive établis (CAM-ICU, NU-DESC, 4AT), démontrant une précision de prédiction supérieure.

task_details.task_instructions: Créez un modèle d'évaluation des risques de pharmacogénomique personnalisée pour prédire les événements indésirables à partir de médicaments anticancéreux spécifiques chez les patients en oncologie présentant une fonction hépatique compromise. Ce modèle doit utiliser des variations génétiques dans les enzymes de traitement médicamenteuses, les transporteurs membranaires et les récepteurs cibles, ainsi que des facteurs cliniques tels que les niveaux d'enzymes hépatiques, les caractéristiques tumorales et les données démographiques. Calculez un score de risque combiné montrant la probabilité d'événements indésirables sévères (grade 3-4) tels que définis par les critères CTCAE V5.0 au cours des quatre premières semaines de traitement. Offrez des ajustements posologiques détaillés en fonction des catégories de risques.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
Risk Score = Σ[w_i × hepatic_factor_i] + Σ[w_j × genetic_factor_j] + Σ[w_k × PK_change_k] + Σ[w_l × drug_interaction_l]

where:
- hepatic_factor_i includes normalized values for liver tests (bilirubin, albumin, INR, liver enzymes)
- genetic_factor_j represents the metabolic impact coefficient for each relevant genetic polymorphism
- PK_change_k quantifies changes in drug disposition parameters (AUC, Cmax, clearance)
- drug_interaction_l accounts for concomitant medications with potential interactions

Probability of Grade 3-4 ADR = 1/(1 + e^(-β₀ - β₁×Risk_Score - Σ[β_m × other_covariates_m]))

Dosage Adjustment Factor (DAF) = Base_Dose × (1 - α × Risk_Score) where α is calibrated to ensure DAF has a range of [0.25, 1.0]

task_details.task_instructions: Créez un modèle d'évaluation des risques pharmacogénomique personnalisé pour prévoir les effets indésirables à des médicaments cytotoxiques particuliers chez les patients en oncologie souffrant de dysfonctionnement hépatique concomitante. Le modèle doit intégrer les variations génétiques des enzymes de traitement des médicaments, des transporteurs et des récepteurs cibles, ainsi que des variables cliniques telles que les tests de fonction hépatique, les attributs tumoraux et la démographie des patients. Calculez un score de risque composite qui évalue la probabilité d'événements indésirables de grade 3-4 basés sur les normes NCI-CTCAE V5.0 dans les 28 premiers jours de l'initiation du thérapie. Offrez des recommandations détaillées pour les ajustements posologiques en fonction des catégories de risques.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
Risk Score = Σ[w_i × phenotypic_factor_i] + Σ[w_j × genotypic_factor_j] + Σ[w_k × PK_alteration_k] + Σ[w_l × drug_interaction_l]

where:
- phenotypic_factor_i includes normalized values for hepatic parameters (bilirubin, albumin, INR, transaminases)
- genotypic_factor_j represents the metabolic impact coefficient for each relevant genetic variant
- PK_alteration_k quantifies changes in drug exposure parameters (AUC, Cmax, clearance)
- drug_interaction_l accounts for concomitant medications with potential interactions

Probability of Grade 3-4 ADR = 1/(1 + e^(-β₀ - β₁×Risk_Score - Σ[β_m × additional_covariates_m]))

Dose Adjustment Factor (DAF) = Base_Dose × (1 - α × Risk_Score) where α is calibrated to ensure DAF has a range of [0.25, 1.0]

task_details.task_instructions: Cree un modelo personalizado para predecir eventos adversos a medicamentos anticancerígenos específicos en pacientes con oncología con función hepática comprometida.  El modelo debe usar variaciones genéticas en enzimas de procesamiento de fármacos, transportadores y receptores objetivo, además de factores clínicos como los niveles de enzimas hepáticas, los detalles del tumor y la demografía del paciente. Calcule un puntaje de riesgo combinado que estima la probabilidad de efectos secundarios severos (grado 3-4) (usando CTCAE v5.0) dentro de las primeras cuatro semanas de tratamiento inicial. Ofrezca recomendaciones detalladas para cambios de dosis basados ​​en categorías de riesgos.
task_details.mathematical_formulation:
Risk Score = Σ[w_i × hepatic_parameter_i] + Σ[w_j × genetic_variant_j] + Σ[w_k × PK_change_k] + Σ[w_l × drug_interaction_l]

where:
- hepatic_parameter_i includes normalized values for liver enzymes (bilirubin, albumin, INR, transaminases)
- genetic_variant_j represents the metabolic impact coefficient for each relevant genetic polymorphism
- PK_change_k quantifies changes in drug exposure (AUC, Cmax, clearance)
- drug_interaction_l accounts for concomitant medications with potential interactions
